scripts.docker:rebuild: docker-compose down && docker-compose build --no-cache && docker-compose up -d
scripts.db:setup: npm run docker:up && sleep 10 && npm run db:migrate
scripts.kafka:create-topics: npm run kafka:create-ocr-topics && npm run kafka:create-notification-topics
scripts.kafka:create-ocr-topics: docker exec patient-notes-kafka kafka-topics --bootstrap-server localhost:9092 --create --topic ocr-processing-jobs --partitions 3 --replication-factor 1
scripts.kafka:create-notification-topics: docker exec patient-notes-kafka kafka-topics --bootstrap-server localhost:9092 --create --topic user-notifications --partitions 2 --replication-factor 1
scripts.services:health-individual: npm run services:check-postgres && npm run services:check-redis && npm run services:check-kafka
scripts.setup: npm install && npm run docker:up && sleep 15 && npm run kafka:create-topics && npm run db:setup
scripts.dev:full: npm run docker:up && npm run dev
scripts.clean: npm run docker:clean && rm -rf node_modules && rm -rf .next
